hymn.title: Two eyes to see all that my Lord has made

layout.singingstanza: Two eyes to see all that my Lord has made, Two ears to lis -- ten to His ho -- ly Word. Two feet to run the way of righ -- teous -- ness, And my two hands for serv -- ing Christ my Lord.

lyrics.stanza: Two eyes to see all that my Lord has made, Two ears to listen to His holy Word. Two feet to run the way of righteousness, And my two hands for serving Christ my Lord.
